column5: Anyone know the beer & liquor store hours in Ft Frances on Saturdays.Heading up tommorrow.

IaDave:Beer store is located at 343 FIFTH ST. EAST, FORT FRANCES and Saturday hours are 9:30 AM to 6 PM. You can check out the beer store yourself at http://www.thebeerstore.ca The liquor store is located at 210 THIRD STREET EAST,FORT FRANCES and their Saturday hours are the same as the beer store. Check out the LCBO at http://www.lcbo.com/index_eng.htmlGood fishing. Jay
